item.title: Fight Club
item.description: I really need a break from this monotony, for this reason I gotta ask you something. Yeah, you, who are reading this.

item.title: The Subtle Art of Not Giving a F*ck
item.description: I think this is the 4th year in a row that this happens. I had a drink with 2 old friends that I originally met in 2015.
